Package rekit.logic.gui.menu

Class BoolSetting

java.lang.Object
rekit.logic.gui.GuiElement
rekit.logic.gui.menu.MenuItem
rekit.logic.gui.menu.BoolSetting
public final class BoolSetting extends MenuItem
This class defines a menu to modify setting (boolean) of GameConf.
